on reading compounds: 罪悪【ザイアク】crime, sin, vice
同罪【ドウザイ】same crime, being equally guilty
功罪【コウザイ】merits and demerits, good points and bad points, strengths and weaknesses
kun reading compounds: 罪【つみ】crime, sin, wrongdoing, indiscretion, penalty, sentence, punishment, fault, responsibility, culpability, thoughtlessness, lack of consideration
罪滅ぼし【つみほろぼし】atonement, expiation
無実の罪【むじつのつみ】false charge
重い罪【おもいつみ】serious crime, grave crime
